T02D2585:150b-0: @150b # // thig ga dab pa'i rim pa /
T02D2585:150b-1: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2585:150b-2: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i thig skud kyis //
T02D2585:150b-3: yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa gzhi la ;
T02D2585:150b-4: ; tshangs thig zur thig logs thig rnams //
T02D2585:150b-5: gzhan dang mthun par gdab byas nas //
T02D2585:150b-6: phyi dang nang du dbye bar bya //
T02D2585:150b-7: phyi la drug drug bcu gnyis te //
T02D2585:150b-8: nang du brgyad brgyad bcu drug gdab //
T02D2585:150b-9: cha chen nyi shu brgyad du 'gyur //
T02D2585:150b-10: so so'i cha ni dbye bar bya //
T02D2585:150b-11: nang gi brgyad po gnyis po yang /
T02D2585:150b-12: re re'ang bzhi bzhir bgo bya zhing //
T02D2585:150b-13: phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig la ni //
T02D2585:150b-14: dang po khyams su gzhag par bya //
T02D2585:150b-15: gnyis pa gsum pa bzhi pa dang //
T02D2585:150b-16: lnga po rnams ni bzhi bzhir bgo / drug pa la ni gnyis su bya //
T02D2585:150b-17: drug po gzhan yang de bzhin bgo /'di la //
T02D2585:150b-18: phreng ba re yang re'u mig ni ;
T02D2585:150b-19: ; brgya dang cha chung gnyis su 'gyur //
T02D2585:150b-20: tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis las //
T02D2585:150b-21: gsum pa de bzhin lnga pa dang //
T02D2585:150b-22: bcu bdun pa dang nyi shu pa //
T02D2585:150b-23: de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gsum pa //
T02D2585:150b-24: cha lngar nang du bgo bar bya //
T02D2585:150b-25: phyi yi gsum pa lnga pa rnams //
T02D2585:150b-26: de bzhin du ni bgo bar bya //
T02D2585:150b-27: gnyis pa lnga pa brgyad pa rnams //
T02D2585:150b-28: cha chung lnga lngar gdab par bya //
T02D2585:150b-29: phyi sgo sum chas che bar dbyi //
T02D2585:150b-30: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ru //
T02D2585:150b-31: ya phugs bcas pa dbus su dbyi //
T02D2585:150b-32: rta babs ya phubs dag la ni //
T02D2585:150b-33: cha gcig dor ba'i cha chen tshad //
T02D2585:150b-34: sgro yi mtshams dang tva ra na //
T02D2585:150b-35: shin tu gcig nyid mi bya'o //
T02D2585:150b-36: de steng 'khor lo rdzogs par bya //
T02D2585:150b-37: tshangs nas cha chung brgyad la ni //
T02D2585:150b-38: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad thig tu gdab //
T02D2585:150b-39: lte ba cha gsum mu khyud gcig / de nas rtsibs brgyad cha phran bzhi //
T02D2585:150b-40: man ngag thig la tshod kyis bskor //
T02D2585:150b-41: de rgyab cha chung gcig la ni //
T02D2585:150b-42: nang gi mu khyud legs par bya //
T02D2585:150b-43: cha chung gcig la lte bar bya //
T02D2585:150b-44: de brten cha chung lnga la ni //
T02D2585:150b-45: rtsibs ni bcu drug 'khor lo bya //
T02D2585:150b-46: de rgyab cha chung mu khyud 'gyur //
T02D2585:150b-47: de rgyab nang sgo cha chen bzhi //
T02D2585:150b-48: dkyil 'khor phyi rol khyams dag la //
T02D2585:150b-49: rtsibs bcu drug tu gdab par bya //
T02D2585:150b-50: de rjes cha chen bzhi po la //
T02D2585:150b-51: phyi yi sgo ni rdzogs par gzhag /
T02D2585:151a-0: @151a * // mtshan nyid gong ma bzhin du dbye //
T02D2585:151a-1: phyi rol rdo rje phreng gsal ba //
T02D2585:151a-2: cha chen gyi ni phyed kyi tshad //
T02D2585:151a-3: 'bar ba'i phreng ba'ang de yi tshad //
T02D2585:151a-4: sgrub thabs gsang ba dang ldan pa'i thig gi cho
T02D2585:151a-5: ga / pandi ta smri ti dzany'a na k'i rtis
